summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing an agreement in the amount of One Hundred Fifty Thousand Six Hundred Twenty Five Dollars ($150,625) with the Washington State Traffic Safety Commission for the purchase and installation of mobile data terminal communications devices to assist traffic officers in enforcing the Driving With License Suspended Program; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1999 Budget of the Police Department by making a reimbursable appropriation; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
